name: It's Never Too Late
description:
this was made in less than 48 hours, we had a lot of fun creating and writing the story, developing how the game will be in the future,
    we had some difficulties, but we did our best.
    the game is about motivation, to trust yourself more, and to fight for your dreams.
    in memory , Kobe Bryant and his legendary quotes.
    we know the design is not that good, the lvl is basic, but we did try to give player an experience of building and repairing his way to sucess while having a conversation with kobe
    i hope you will love this game
    thank you so much for taking the time to read and play it
